post.body: thanks, I tend to ramble and altho others find it easy to cut down for some reason I lack that skill :s
I saw somewhere that DIGG has accounts now and when I searched them on Twitter I found they have quite a few!! Check it out
I know what you mean. I am not sure how I feel about it. I guess it all depends on where you draw the line! Glad I'm not choosing.
I agree with you on both accounts. People get too caught up in these silly # rankings and ignore the real important factors
